history.proof: intros pre p post H. srun best use: wp_complete.

exceptions.exn: In environment pre : E.Env -> Type post : Pred H : pre |= Iskip [=post =] Unable to unify "pre |= Iskip [=post =]" with "pre |= post".

original: intros pre p post H. unfold synt_wp. induction p. - simpl. apply H. - simpl. apply H. - simpl. split; intros. + apply IHp1. apply H. + apply IHp2. apply H. - simpl. exists post, (fun _ _ => False). split; [apply Acc_intro|]. split; [intros _|split; [intros|]]; apply H.
